properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , USER_ID , REGIST_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER ON (NOTICE_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
